Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Param: Update VendorPaymentMethodACH SET BankRoutingNumber = '025420003' where VendorPaymentMethodId = (select VendorPaymentMethodId from VendorPaymentMethods where VendorId = 'S MINI MART Q39' and PaymentMethodId = 1 and EnrollmentStatusId = 2)

Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: SearchInTabApprovals
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Approvals Tab (Images\Customer\Payment\51.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Payments waiting for my approval)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClearBeforeSearch(true) means clear all existing search chips before add new search chip

Keyword.Name: ApproveFirstPayment
Keyword.Description: Approve First Payment after search, use this keyword after keyword SearchInTabApproval and/or SortPaymentApprovals to make sure there is one result payment (Images\Customer\Payment\54.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: PaymentNumber of first payment need to approve, null means don't care the name, will approve first payment

Param.Name: sExpectedStatus
Param.Description: Expected Status of Approval

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by contains, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sMasterCardNumber
Param.Description: Verify MasterCard Number, input digit only, no space, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sExpirationDate
Param.Description: Verify Expiration Date, format MM/dd, means by pass verify

Param.Name: sSecurityCode
Param.Description: Verify Security Code, means by pass verify

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Verify Payment Number, means by pass verify

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Verify Payment Date, means by pass verify

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Verify Payment Amount, means by pass verify

Param.Name: sPayToName
Param.Description: Verify Pay To Name, means by pass verify

Param.Name: sPayeeVendorID
Param.Description: Verify Payee or VendorID, means by pass verify

Param.Name: lstFieldName
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue1
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ;, if a Value is empty, use null - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue2
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ;, if a Value is empty, use null - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue3
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ;, if a Value is empty, use null - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue4
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ;, if a Value is empty, use null - null means not check

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Param.Description: ClearBeforeSearch(true) means clear all existing search chips before add new search chip

Keyword.Name: VerifySingleNotificationComment
Keyword.Description: Verify single notification comment for current user (Images\Customer\Common\4.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Keyword will base on Payment Number, can't be null

Param.Name: sNumberOfCardComment
Param.Description: Check number of comment card base on Payment Number above

Param.Name: sPayToName
Param.Description: PayToName of that Payment Number, null means by pass check it

Param.Name: sTimeAgo
Param.Description: Time ago of this comment, keyword will check by contains, null means by pass check it

Param.Name: sCommentUser
Param.Description: Comment user, null means by pass check it

Param.Name: sCommentContent
Param.Description: Content of comment, null means by pass check it

Param.Name: sDismissCard
Param.Description: Dismiss this card or not

Param.Name: sClickOnCard
Param.Description: Click on card and verify again the information of sCommentUser, sCommentContent, yes, no, null

Param.Name: sCommentTime
Param.Description: this parameter is used only when sClickOnCard = yes, it will check Comment Time by contains, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sClickReplyButton
Param.Description: Click Reply button to open Comment Dialog, if yes you should use keyword AddCommentForFirstPayment to continue

Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Param.Description: ClearBeforeSearch(true) means clear all existing search chips before add new search chip

Keyword.Name: ClickProcessOnFirstPayment
Keyword.Description: Select first payment and click on Icon Process, before using this keyword: use keyword SearchInPaymentPage to get only one result, after using this keyword: use keyword ProcessPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\43.png)

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch (https://i.imgur.com/muD6MoT.png)

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries

Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch (https://i.imgur.com/muD6MoT.png)

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch (https://i.imgur.com/muD6MoT.png)

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Description: Verify single Batch Processing alert for current user (Images\Customer\Common\10.png)

Param.Description: Check number of card Payment Batch Processing

Param.Name: sTimeAgo
Param.Description: Time ago of Card, keyword will check by contains, null means by pass check it

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name, verify by contains, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sNumberOfPayment
Param.Description: Number of payment, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sTotalAmount
Param.Description: Total Amount of Batch, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sDismissCard
Param.Description: Dismiss this card or not

Param.Name: sClickOnCard
Param.Description: Click on card and verify again the information of sCommentUser, sCommentContent, yes, no, null

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: VerifySelectedBankAccountBatchTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Verify current selected Bank Account, Batch in tab Processed, use this keyword after keyword VerifySingleBatchProcessNotification or VerifyGroupBatchProcessNotification with paramter "sClickOnCard = yes" (Images\Customer\Payment\70.png)

Param.Name: sSelectedTab
Param.Description: The name of current selected tab, can't be null

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Selected Bank Account need to verify, can't be null

Param.Name: sBatch
Param.Description: Selected Batch Name need to verify. Note that: will find by content because all information of Batch store in a button, can't be null

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch (https://i.imgur.com/muD6MoT.png)

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: VerifyNumberOfNewNotification
Keyword.Description: Verify number of New Notification of current user(Images\Customer\Common\2.png)

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of New Notification of current user

Param.Name: sResetToZero
Param.Description: Reset to no new Notification, yes means click on Notification Icon then click again to reset, no or null means by pass it

Keyword.Name: VerifyGroupBatchProcessNotification
Keyword.Description: Verify Group Batch Processing alert for current user (Images\Customer\Common\11.png)

Param.Name: sBatchProcessStatus
Param.Description: Keyword will base on Batch Process Status to find card --> Can't be null , Success, Error, Partially

Param.Name: sNumberOfCard
Param.Description: Check number of card Payment Batch Processing

Param.Name: sNumberOfBatchesProcessSuccess
Param.Description: In case of Batches Process successful, it'll show Number or Payment, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sTimeAgo
Param.Description: Time ago of Card, keyword will check by contains, null means by pass check it

Param.Name: sDismissCard
Param.Description: Dismiss this card or not

Param.Name: sClickOnCard
Param.Description: Click on card and verify again the information of sCommentUser, sCommentContent, yes, no, null

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)
